title: Thirteenth World Congress on Medical Law
abstract: The 13th World Congress on Medical Law will be held at the Marina Congress Center, Helsinki, Finland, from 6 to 10 August 2000. For information and further details, please contact Pirkko Kuorehj√§rvi, Congress Manager: tel +358 9 3967 2073; fax +358 9 3967 2030; email pirkkok@stakes.fi
